trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required of a service for providing access to a data source at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, creates and returns an instance of the given data source, and adds it to the design surface.

You should only call the AddDataSourceInstance method on data sources that are designable for example, if the<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor.IsDesignable%2A> value is `true`.
This method enables the service implementer to perform custom actions when a data source is added to the design surface.
The designer host.
The data source.
An <xref:System.Object> representing an instance of the added data source.
The type name cannot be created or resolved.
When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the collection of data sources at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no data sources at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.
When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Add New Data Source Wizard**.
The parent window.
The initial position of a form.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> collection of newly added data sources, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no data sources are added.
When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Configure Data Source** dialog box on the specified data source.
The parent window.
The initial position of a form.
The data source.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any changes were made to that data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The specified data source is invalid or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, notifies the service that a component representing a data source was added to the design surface.
The data source component.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports adding a new data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service supports adding a new data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports configuring data sources using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service supports configuring a data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
